name: browserify-shim
description: Shims commonJS incompatible modules so they can be browserified.

scripts.shim-jquery: cd examples/shim-jquery && npm install && node build.js && opener index.html
scripts.shim-underscore: cd examples/shim-underscore && npm install && node build.js && opener index.html

author: Thorsten Lorenz <thlorenz@gmx.de> (thlorenz.com)
